discourse_list.title: Know Your MIP KYM #13 | MakerDAO Delegates MIP Set

content.content: Know Your MIP KYM #13 | MakerDAO Delegates MIP Set  For the Know Your MIP series’ 13th session, we will walk you through the MakerDAO Delegates MIP Set:  MIP77: Delegates in the Maker Protocol MIP78: Recognized Delegate DAI Compensation MIP79: Recognized Delegate MKR Compensation  We are looking forward to feeding the discussion around Delegates! Sharpen your minds and bring in as many input as it flows!  If you can’t make it and you have a boiling question or comment you would like to get addressed, please DM me or post it on this thread and we will make sure it is covered!   Join us! @prose11  will host  @gala will assist   Agenda:  Presentation of Delegates in MakerDAO MIP Set  Discussion   When Time in your local-timezone format: 2022-08-24T16:00:00Z  Call Recording      Meeting ID: 874 5567 6075 Passcode: KYMGOV att: @Core-Facilitators, @Recognized-Delegates, @GovAlpha-Core-Unit

Know Your MIP #13 - Editorial August 24th, 2022  Agenda   00:00: Intro with Gala   07:10: Presentation, Discussion and Questions with Payton Rose   55:27: Conclusion   Video https://youtu.be/zATpBvs_39g  Introduction  Gala  Hello, everyone. Welcome to Know Your MIP episode #13. My name is Gala, and I am with GovAlpha. We are here today to talk about the MakerDAO delegate MIP Set.   Presentation  Payton Rose 07:10  Delegation MIPs(77-79)1565×893 65.9 KB   Delegation History @ Maker (The Briefest of Overviews)1570×880 180 KB   MIP77 - MakerDAO Delegates1568×892 131 KB   MIP77 - Major Changes / Potential Controversies1565×873 139 KB   MIP78 - Recognized Delegate DAI Compensation1566×885 148 KB   MIP79 - Recognized Delegate MKR Vesting1567×884 127 KB   Some feedback from the forums1565×810 110 KB   Questions 37:04 - CodeKnight: How do we distinguish between good and bad requests for retroactive compensation for CUs? 39:10 - Raphael: How can we mitigate conflict of interest? Delegates voting on their comp is super not an easy thing to do because we like getting paid. How do you approach that? 42:36 - Raphael: Have you thought about the term limits for delegates? 47:06 - David Utrobin: Are there any benchmarks for delegate compensation? 52:42 - Kianga Daverington: It seems like there is not a lot of available MKR to bring into the governance contract. 54:43 - Mark: Should we partner with exchanges to facilitate smaller delegations?  Outro  Gala 55:27  Thank you, everyone, for joining. Let us keep the discussions at forum.makerdao.com    Credits  Kunfu-po produced this summary. Everyone who spoke and presented on the call.
